1.0.1.name: wordpress/minimag
1.0.1.description: MiniMag is a responsive WordPress Theme made for people who love beautiful typography.Along with the elegant design the theme is easily customizable with numerous theme options, for example you will be able to easily edit logo, menus, social profiles links and banners. You can find more details about configuration on the demo website : minimag.codeinwp.com .
